quotes.message: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty.
quotes.name: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.message: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.name: Hannah Arendt

quotes.message: An ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness.
quotes.name: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.message: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.name: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.message: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty.
quotes.name: Haniel Long

quotes.message: We both have a great loyalty to it, and I think that it's important to give it our best shot.
quotes.name: Nicholas Lea

quotes.message: You've got to give loyalty down, if you want loyalty up.
quotes.name: Donald T. Regan

quotes.message: Loyalty means nothing unless it has at its heart the absolute principle of self-sacrifice.
quotes.name: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.message: When does loyalty become martyrdom?
quotes.name: Robert Charles Wilson

quotes.message: Loyalty is something you give regardless of what you get back, and in giving loyalty, you're getting more loyalty; and out of loyalty flow other great qualities.
quotes.name: Charles Tremendous Jones

quotes.message: Unless you can find some sort of loyalty, you cannot find unity and peace in your active living.
quotes.name: Josiah Royce

quotes.message: Lack of loyalty is one of the major causes of failure in every walk of life.
quotes.name: Napoleon Hill

quotes.message: A family in harmony will prosper in everything.
quotes.name: Chinese Proverb

quotes.message: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.name: Richard Bach

quotes.message: Loyalty means giving me your honest opinion, whether you think I'll like it or not. Disagreement, at this state, stimulates me. But once a decision is made, the debate ends. From that point on, loyalty means executing the decision as if it were your own.
quotes.name: General Colin Powell

quotes.message: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
quotes.name: Clarence Francis

quotes.message: Loyalty isn't grey. It's black and white. You're either loyal completely, or not loyal at all.
quotes.name: Sharnay

quotes.message: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day- by- day.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.message: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.name: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.message: Be loyal to those who are not present. In doing so, you build the trust of those who are present.
quotes.name: Stephen Covey

quotes.message: Loyalty is what makes us trust, Trust is what makes us stay, Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.name: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.message: Loyalty is the highest virtue taught by abusers, and used as a control tool.
quotes.name: Dr Bill Tollefson

quotes.message: We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty.
quotes.name: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.message: Where there is loyalty, weapons are of no use.
quotes.name: Paulo Coelho

quotes.message: The whole point of loyalty was not to change: stick with those who stuck with you.
quotes.name: Larry McMurtry

quotes.message: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than fidelity. Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.name: Cicero

quotes.message: The only true test of loyalty is fidelity in the face of ruin and despair.
quotes.name: Eric Felten

quotes.message: I'm very loyal in relationships. Even when I go out with my mom I don't look at other moms.
quotes.name: Garry Shandling

quotes.message: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.name: Mario Puzo

quotes.message: I don't like to give up on people when they need someone not to give up on them.
quotes.name: Carrol Bryant

quotes.message: Birds of a feather flock together.
quotes.name: Proverb

quotes.message: A healthy loyalty is not passive and complacent, but active and critical.
quotes.name: Harold Laski

quotes.message: Loyalty is a major force making for unity in any life-even in the existence of a civilization.... It gives point and flavor, most of all meaning, to a life or a culture.
quotes.name: Harmon M. Gehr

quotes.message: There is one element that is worth its weight in gold and that is loyalty. It will cover a multitude of weaknesses.
quotes.name: Philip Armour

quotes.message: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.name: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.message: He speaketh not; and yet there lies a conversation in his eyes.
quotes.name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.message: It is better to be faithful than famous.
quotes.name: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.message: Commitment is an act, not a word.
quotes.name: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.message: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Faithfulness lives where love is stronger than instinct.
quotes.name: Paul Carvel

quotes.message: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
quotes.name: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.message: I like people who are loyal to me, and I like to be loyal, too.
quotes.name: George Strait

quotes.message: It is the soul's duty to be loyal to its own desires. It must abandon itself to its master passion.
quotes.name: Rebecca West

quotes.message: Very few people deserted me when I went to prison. They stayed loyal.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.message: A little thing is a little thing, but faithfulness in little things is a great thing.
quotes.name: Hudson Taylor

quotes.message: It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
quotes.name: Ralph Ellison

quotes.message: Commitment. This is my favorite word because in some way, people who are committed are always much more interesting and much more reliable, and much more, I would say, deep than people who are not.
quotes.name: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.message: It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill.
quotes.name: Emilie Autumn

quotes.message: If by my life or death I can protect you, I will.
quotes.name: J.R.R. Tolkien
